text: Pilomecyna is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Pilomecyna. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Pilomecyna excavata Breuning, 1940 * Pilomecyna flavolineata Breuning, 1957 * Pilomecyna griseolineata Breuning, 1957 * Pilomecyna grisescens Breuning, 1980 * Pilomecyna longeantennata Breuning, 1942 * Pilomecyna serieguttata (Fairmaire, 1899) ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Pilomecyna
